overview.en: Basid Coin (BASID) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Basid Coin has a current supply of 10,000,000,000 with 573,652,726 in circulation. The last known price of Basid Coin is 0.10286056 USD and is down -1.73 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $1,504,578.32 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://basidcoin.com/.
